Package test_a_d_r_neumann
[test_transport]

Test advection diffusion and reaction in a single channel with uniform flow, subjected to neumann boundary condition. More...

Variables

integer, parameter nstep_base = 256
integer, parameter nx_base = 512
integer, parameter nconc = 2
real(stm_real), parameter start_time = 256.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter total_time = 512.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter domain_length = 4000.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter origin = 12800.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter const_area = 110.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter const_disp_coef = 150.0d0
real(stm_real), parameter const_velocity = 2.9d0
real(stm_real), parameter decay_rate = 0.0005d0
real(stm_real), parameter ic_center = origin + domain_length/(ten)
real(stm_real), parameter ic_peak = one
real(stm_real) end_time = start_time + total_time

Detailed Description

Test advection diffusion and reaction in a single channel with uniform flow, subjected to neumann boundary condition.

Parameters:

conc Concentration
area area at source
flow flow at source location
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time time

subroutine test_a_d_r_neumann.neumann_adr_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  down_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  theta_stm,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Parameters:
center_diag Values of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
up_diag Values of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
down_diag Values of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
right_hand_side Values of the coefficients of the right hand side
area Cell centered area at new time
area_lo Low side area at new time
area_hi High side area at new time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
theta_stm Explicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
ncell Number of cells
time Current time
nvar Number of variables
dx Spatial step
dt Time step

subroutine test_a_d_r_neumann.neumann_adr_diffusive_flux ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc,

real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,

real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Parameters:
diffusive_flux_lo face flux, lo side
diffusive_flux_hi face flux, hi side
conc concentration
area_lo Low side area centered at old time
area_hi High side area centered at old time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef.
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef.
ncell number of cells
nvar number of variables
time time

subroutine test_a_d_r_neumann.neumann_adr_dvective_flux ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx 
)

Parameters:
flux_lo flux on lo side of cell, time centered
flux_hi flux on hi side of cell, time centered
conc_lo concentration extrapolated to lo face
conc_hi concentration extrapolated to hi face
flow_lo flow on lo side of cells centered in time
flow_hi flow on hi side of cells centered in time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
dt Time step
dx Spatial step

subroutine test_a_d_r_neumann.test_advect_diffuse_reaction_neumann ( logical  verbose  ) 

Subroutine that tests error convergence of advection diffusion reaction.

Parameters:
verbose whether to output convergence results

subroutine test_a_d_r_neumann.uniform_flow_adr ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  flow,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  flow_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  area_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

generat constant area and constant flow foreward and backward

Parameters:
flow cell and time centered flow
flow_lo lo face flow, time centered
flow_hi hi face flow, time centered
area cell center area, old time
area_lo area lo face, time centered
area_hi area hi face, time centered
ncell number of cells
time time of request
dx spatial step
dt time step
